remarks: Lemma used to derive properties of norm.  Part of Remark 3.4(B) of [Beran] p. 98.  (Contributed by NM, 10-May-2005.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: normlem9at $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H ) -> ( ( A -h B ) .ih ( A -h B ) ) = ( ( ( A .ih A ) + ( B .ih B ) ) - ( ( A .ih B ) + ( B .ih A ) ) ) ) $.
